field.label: Item Type
field.hint: Select the type(s) of content you are depositing. To select more than one value in the list, you may have to hold down the "CTRL" or "Shift" or "COMMAND" key. Examples: Article, Learning Object, Video Recording and Presentation.

field.label: Author(s)/Creator(s)
field.hint: Enter the name(s) of the author(s) or creator(s). Enter each name individually, then click "Add". To use VTechWorks' name lookup function, click "Lookup" and you will be directed to an index of VTechWorks' creator and contributor names. Examples: Faulkner, William; Einstein, Albert; Lovelace, Ada

field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter the title or name of the item. If a title is not provided, create one that appropriately describes the item. Examples: Extended Boolean Information Retrieval, Ossian and the Genres of Culture, Chemistry of Arsenic Removal During Coagulation and Fe-Mn Oxidation
field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.

field.label: Date
field.hint: Enter date of previous publication or public distribution. A year is required, but month and day are optional. If the item has not been previously published, enter today's date. Examples: 2010, 1969 July 01, 1995 August
field.required: You must enter at least the year.

field.label: Identifiers
field.hint: If the item has any identification numbers or codes associated with it, please enter them. Examples: DOI 10.1056/NEJMoa1510991, URL http://www.johncairns.net/ebook2.htm, ISSN 0272-3638

field.label: Language
field.hint: Select the language of the main content of the item. If the language does not appear in the list, please select 'Other'. If the content does not really have a language (for example, if it is a dataset or an image) please select "N/A." Examples: English, French, Chinese

field.label: Conference Title
field.hint: Examples: Modern Language Association Annual Meeting, 2016 IEEE International Symposium on Circuits and Systems, Veterans in Society 2015.

field.label: Publisher
field.hint: If the item has been published or accepted for publication, enter the publisher. If the item has not been published, enter "Virginia Tech." Examples: Wiley, Cornell University Press, Taylor & Francis

field.label: Series/Report Number
field.hint: Enter the series and number assigned to this item. Examples: Virginia Cooperative Extension BSE-51NP, Airport Cooperative Research Program 124, TMC75-07-H-00008

field.label: Funding
field.hint: Enter the names of any funders and/or grant numbers. Enter each funder name or grant number separately, then click "Add." Examples: National Science Foundation [Add], NSF: DMR-01-02277 [Add]

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: Enter a brief summary of the item. Preferred length is a single paragraph or about 300 words, although you may enter an abstract of any length.

field.label: Subject Keywords
field.hint: Enter any keywords or phrases that describe the item's content, especially any that do not appear in the Abstract. Enter each keyword or phrase separately, then click "Add." Repeat for all keywords or phrases. Examples: New River Valley, VA [Add], remote sensing [Add], photogrammetry [Add]

field.label: Journal Title
field.hint: Examples: Foreign Affairs, PLOS One, Nature

field.label: Volume
field.hint: Examples: 29, XVI, 1999

field.label: Issue
field.hint: Examples: 4, 2, Summer

field.label: Notes
field.hint: Enter any additional information that will help describe the item.

field.label: Other Titles
field.hint: If the item has any alternative titles, please enter them here.

field.label: Citation
field.hint: Enter the standard citation for the previously issued instance of this item.

field.label: Episode Title
field.hint: If the item is an episode in a series or compilation, enter the item's episode title here.

field.label: Creation Date
field.hint: Enter the date when the item was created. For interview, enter the date when the raw interview was conducted.

field.label: Director(s)
field.hint: Enter the name of the person(s) responsible for the general management and supervision of a filmed performance, radio or television program, etc.

field.label: Editor(s)
field.hint: Enter the name of the person or organization responsible for assembling, arranging, and trimming film, video, or other moving image formats, including both visual and audio components.

field.label: Interviewee(s)
field.hint: For interviews, enter the name of the person who was interviewed.

field.label: Interviewer(s)
field.hint: For interviews, enter the name of the person(s) who conducted the interview.

field.label: Contributor - Other
field.hint: Enter the name(s) of an entity or entities responsible for making contributions to the resource.

field.label: Duration
field.hint: Enter the length or duration of the resource. Represents the playback time. Format: HH:MM:SS (Example: 02:33:53 for a film that is 2 hours, 33 minutes, and 53 seconds)

field.label: Transcription
field.hint: If available, provide a textual transcription of the item.

field.label: Rights Holder
field.hint: Enter the name of the person or organization that owns or manages rights over the item you are submitting. Enter organization names in the "Last Name" field.

field.label: One: Authors
field.hint: Enter the names of the authors of this item.

field.label: Author(s)/Creator(s)
field.hint: Enter the name(s) of the author(s) or creator(s). Enter each name individually, then click "Add." To use VTechWorks' name lookup function, click "Lookup" and you will be directed to an index of VTechWorks' creator and contributor names. Examples: Faulkner, William; Einstein, Albert; Lovelace, Ada
field.required: You must enter the author of this item.

field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter the title or name of the item. If a title is not provided, create one that appropriately describes the item. Examples: Extended Boolean Information Retrieval, Ossian and the Genres of Culture, Chemistry of Arsenic Removal During Coagulation and Fe-Mn Oxidation
field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.

field.label: Other Titles
field.hint: If the item has any alternative titles, please enter them here.

field.label: Date
field.hint: Enter date of publication or public distribution. A year is required, but month and day are optional. If the item has not been previously published, enter today's date. Examples: 2010, 1969 July 01, 1995 August
field.required: You must enter at least the year.

field.label: Department
field.hint: Enter the contributing department of the item.
field.required: You must enter a contributing department for this item.

field.label: Discipline
field.hint: Select the OMALS discipline of the item.
field.required: You must select a discipline for this item.

field.label: Committee Chair
field.hint: Enter the names of the committee chair or committee co-chairs of this item.

field.label: Committee Member
field.hint: Enter the names of the committee members of this item.
field.required: You must enter the committee members for this item.

field.label: Item Type
field.hint: Select the type(s) of content you are depositing. To select more than one value in the list, you may have to hold down the "CTRL" or "Shift" or "COMMAND" key. Examples: Article, Learning Object, Video Recording and Presentation.

field.label: Language
field.hint: Select the language of the main content of the item. If the language does not appear in the list, please select 'Other'. If the content does not really have a language (for example, if it is a dataset or an image) please select "N/A." Examples: English, French, Chinese

field.label: Subject Keywords
field.hint: Enter appropriate subject keywords or phrases from the CAB Agricultural and Environmental Thesaurus. Enter each keyword or phrase separately, then click "Add." Repeat for all keywords or phrases. Examples: New River Valley, VA [Add], remote sensing [Add], photogrammetry [Add]

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: Enter a brief summary of the item. Preferred length is a single paragraph or about 300 words, although you may enter an abstract of any length.

To use VTechWorks' name lookup function, click "Lookup" and you will be directed to an index of VTechWorks' creator and contributor names. Examples: Faulkner, William; Einstein, Albert; Lovelace, Ada

field.label: Committee Chair
field.hint: Enter the names of committee chairs of this item.

field.label: Committee Co-Chair
field.hint: Enter the names of committee co-chairs of this item.

field.label: Committee Members
field.hint: Enter the names of committee members for this item.

field.label: Department
field.hint: Enter the contributing academic department of the item.
field.required: You must enter a contributor department for this item.

field.label: Institution Granting the Degree
field.hint: Enter the thesis degree grantor of the item.
field.required: You must enter a thesis degree grantor for this item.

field.label: Publisher
field.hint: If the item has been published or accepted for publication, enter the publisher. If the item has not been published, enter "Virginia Tech." Examples: Wiley, Cornell University Press, Taylor & Francis

field.label: Degree
field.hint: Level of education associated with the document.

field.label: Degree Name
field.hint: Name of the degree associated with the work as it appears within the work. (example: Masters in Operations Research)

field.hint: Enter area of study. Usually, this will be the name of a program or department.

field.label: Source URL
field.hint: Enter the source URL of the item, if applicable.

field.label: Access Status
field.required: You must select an access status.
